data.description:
Become a master of the bow & arrow!
Hit all targets and waste no arrows to accumulate Stars and earn Gold. Buy new equipment and beat even the most challenging levels.

Pumpkins, target stands, shields and practice dummies, static or combined in intricate moving mechanisms will require precise timing and accuracy and provide a unique variety, where no two levels play the same.

Simple and intuitive controls, stunning 3D graphics and realistic bow mechanics will immerse you into the atmosphere of Middle Ages and offer you a chance to show your true skill.

Features:
•    Polished and realistic archery mechanics - arrows travel fast, following a realistic curve
•    Stylish and beautiful environments
•    Variety of archery equipment
•    Easy to learn, difficult to master
•    Advanced options to fine-tune your archery experience

changelog.change_log:
Added:
45 new levels
3 new challenges
New bow
New arrow
New music tracks
Option to change arrow side
Option to adjust initial arrow trajectory
Option to enable Tracking Loss Assist

New (from community feedback):
- Option to disable the aiming reticle
- Option for additional arrows when the reticle is disabled
- Controller motion smoothing to help with shaky hands
All these options are available in the game settings.
Other:
- Small UI bug fixes and improvements
